attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: Organizations in the past year have shifted from experimental AI projects to implementing more comprehensive strategies, recognizing the complexities of AI integration.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: As the 2024 election season approaches, new methods such as AI-generated calls are beginning to play a critical role in voter engagement and persuasion.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: A Democratic candidate in Pennsylvania utilized an AI chatbot to directly interact with voters, proving that AI might be a more effective tool for swaying opinions than traditional political ads.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: In agriculture, researchers are enhancing crop resilience against climate change by utilizing advanced technology, including AlphaFold, to improve essential enzymes involved in photosynthesis.
